name: Absolut Lime Drop
preparation:
Lemon Drops might get all the love, but the Absolut Lime Drop is the shot you really need to try. The combination of vodka, lime juice and simple syrup is an irresistible balance of sweet and sour.

Add all the ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake.

Strain into a chilled shot glass.

Garnish with a lime wedge.
